overview: Sean D. Williams, PhD has 15 years web-development and project management experience in industry and university settings; expert at online communications and its intersections with entrepreneurship. Sean has co-founded three small, private businesses based upon his expertise and staffed and managed large teams developing corporate intranets, distributed healthcare information solutions, training programs, and most recently 3D virtual world educational installations. Sean is currently Senior Research Fellow at the Internet Interdisciplinary Institute and Professor of Communication at Clemson University, a top-25 university in the United States
